segments.text: I see the entire kitchen layout clearly in this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area's got water running and spilling over the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing away, absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's on, and dishes are piled on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing at her feet, unseen by her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Leftward, the upper cabinets are ajar with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boyâ€™s climbing the stool, which looks off-balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies while holding a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him reaches up expectantly for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly in on this together, quiet and quick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view through the window is calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the indoor hazards feel even more out of place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm concerned the stool will give way and cause a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Also, that water could make everything slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
